Events that occurred on 1 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1939 - Actor David Weatherley is born.
1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 36a.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 56.
1948 - Actor Steven M. Kramer is born.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 195b.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 222d.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Hans-Jörg Modlmayr.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss E. Byrne.
2001 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 16 is published.
2007 - The Company They Keep is published.
2007 - Electronic Arts releases The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology.
2010 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Pocket Guide is published.
2010 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Volume III: Allies of the King, "Oath of the Rangers" is released.
2010 - Oliphaunt Limited Edition Poster is published.
2013 - Vinyar Tengwar 50 is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2931:
Aragorn, son of Arathorn, Heir of Isildur, is born.
T.A. 3019:
Frodo, Sam and Gollum begin the passage of the Dead Marshes at dawn. They temporarily halt and hide from a flying Nazgûl.
The Entmoot, which started on 30 February, continues.
Aragorn enters Fangorn and meets Gandalf the White. They set out for Edoras.
Faramir and his men leave for Ithilien to ambush the Southrons marching to Mordor.
Fo.A. 120:
Death of King Elessar of the Reunited Kingdom of Gondor and Arnor. Eldarion, son of Elessar and Arwen, becomes King.
Fo.A. 121:
Death of Arwen Undómiel, the Queen of the Reunited Kingdom, at Cerin Amroth.
